sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"友好的，亲切的"之意。
means: friendly ： 指举止像朋友一样，往往怀着满腔热情，乐意助人。
kind ： 指考虑周到，体谅他人，乐于助人。
cordial ： 较正式用词，指亲切热诚，情意真挚。

sentence.Network_en: The conversation was carried on in a cordial and friendly atmosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 会谈是在亲切友好的气氛中进行的.

sentence.Network_en: The meeting of the old classmates was extremely cordial.
sentence.Network_cn: 老同学聚会在一起,分外亲热.

sentence.Network_en: We maintain cordial relations with our neighbors.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们与邻里保持亲切友好的关系.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语四级词汇（整理版，16页，可直接打印） - 豆丁网 ... cord n. 细绳，粗线，索 cordial a. 真诚的，诚恳的 core n. 果实的心，核心.
英语四级词汇（整理版，16页，可直接打印） - 豆丁网 ... cord n. 细绳，粗线，索 cordial a. 真诚的，诚恳的 core n. 果实的心，核心.
拉丁语 - 维基百科，自由的百科全书 ... heart 心脏 cordial 衷心的；真挚的 bear 负担、生（小孩）.
新概念第三册精解 ... amiable 亲切的 cordial 热诚的，热心的 faithful 忠诚的.

list.abs: Cordia 科迪亚牌汽车cordial glass 小高脚酒杯cordierite porcelain 堇青石瓷
社会工作专业英语词汇(C2) ... cordial 兴奋的 cordial feeling 亲切感 cordial medicine 兴奋剂.
cordiality 诚实cordially yours 谨上cordially 诚恳地
百度词典搜索_恭 ... [respectful and earnest] 恭敬认真 cordially invite; 恭请 listen with respectful attention; 洗耳恭听.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (also in the sense 'belonging to the heart'): from medieval Latin cordialis, from Latin cor, cord- 'heart'

example.ex: He had never known him to be so chatty and cordial...
example.tran: 他从没见过他如此健谈，如此友善。

example.ex: He said the two countries had close and cordial relations.
example.tran: 他说两国之间有着密切友好的关系。

entry.def: Cordial is a sweet non-alcoholic drink made from fruit juice.

entry.tran: (饭后饮用的)利口酒，烈性甜酒
entry.def: A cordial is a strong alcoholic drink with a sweet taste. You drink it after a meal.

means.word_mean: 1. strong highly flavored sweet liquor usually drunk after a meal

sentences.sentence: "a cordial regard for his visitor's comfort"

auth_sentence.content: Anglo-Soviet relations plummeted from relatively cordial to relatively chilly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Anglo-Soviet relations plummeted from relatively cordial to relatively chilly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Anglo-Soviet relations plummeted from relatively cordial to relatively chilly.

auth_sentence.content: When cooled, add elderflower cordial to taste.
auth_sentence.res_content: When cooled, add elderflower cordial to taste.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When cooled, add elderflower cordial to taste.

auth_sentence.content: Gently fold in the elderflower cordial and liqueur.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gently fold in the elderflower cordial and liqueur.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gently fold in the elderflower cordial and liqueur.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 相符的, 一致的, 根据……而定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accord[n.&v.一致;符合]+ing形容词→adj.相符的, 一致的, 根据……而定的
cord心脏,一致+ial……的→adj.首要的,主要的
accord[n.&v.一致;符合]+ance表名词→n.一致,和谐,符合
cordial[adj.首要的,主要的]+ity表名词→n.诚心,热诚
discord[n.不和;不一致]+ance表名词→n.不协调;　不一致
ac加强+cord心脏,一致→心心相符
re一再+cord心脏,一致→一再放在心上→记录

means.word_mean: 热诚的, 热情友好的

sentences.en: He was cordial in all his letters.
sentences.cn: 他的每封来信都很热情。

jushi.english: We received a cordial welcome at the university.
jushi.chinese: 我们在那所大学里受到热诚的欢迎。

jushi.english: We shall welcome a renewal of our cordial relations.
jushi.chinese: 我们欢迎你我双方真诚关系的恢复。
